item.title: Synctex setup for Vim with Okular
item.description: Editing LaTeX is way easier when one can click in code to jump in PDF, and vice-versa. This feature works out-of-the box in Overleaf or TeX Live, but using our own editor (like vim or vscode) needs some setup. I tried the setup of forward (code to PDF) and reverse search (PDF to code) with vim several times and failed. It is such a pain that I want to give this short tutorial on how I managed to make it work.
